name: UMBRA (DarrenDV)
description:
Umbra is a short game about surviving a battle arena filled with enemy robots trying to kill you.

Kill as many enemies without dying by dodgeing attacks and shots.
When dead, you'll get another shot at life as the enemy who killed you. Their body will morph into yours. 
However, a mimic will spawn that copies your every move from your past live.
Try to lose as little lives as possible.
The game is over when all enemies have died. 

Controls:
WASD to move
LMB to melee
RMB + LMB to shoot
Mouse to look around
